General.Name: Agrogeneration
General.Description: AgroGeneration SA, an agricultural company, engages in the grain and oil commodity crop farming business in Ukraine. It is involved in the farming of wheat. The company also exports its products. AgroGeneration SA was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Paris, France.

1.Name: Mr. Charles  Vilgrain
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Deputy Chief Exec. Officer
